comprehensive_overview: Deepsignal2 is a deep learning-based toolkit for nanopore signal processing and variant detection. It is designed to accurately detect DNA modifications and structural variants from raw nanopore sequencing data.
core_features:
1. Process raw nanopore signal data
2. Detect DNA modifications and structural variations
3. Utilizes deep learning algorithms for improved accuracy
4. Supports real-time analysis of nanopore sequencing data
